trans-unit.source: Your page will be saved as a draft
trans-unit.target: Vaša stranica bit će spremljena kao nacrt

trans-unit.source: You can choose to keep your images stored in the previous system. There's nothing wrong with that.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to keep your images stored in the previous system. There's nothing wrong with that.

trans-unit.source: You can also decide to move your images to the new storage system. In this case, click on the "Move images" button below. Please be patient. This can take several minutes.
trans-unit.target: You can also decide to move your images to the new storage system. In this case, click on the "Move images" button below. Please be patient. This can take several minutes.

trans-unit.source: After moving all of your product images, set the "Use the legacy image filesystem" option above to "No" for best performance.
trans-unit.target: After moving all of your product images, set the "Use the legacy image filesystem" option above to "No" for best performance.

trans-unit.source: If you want to order/move the following data, please select a shop from the shop list.
trans-unit.target: If you want to order/move the following data, please select a shop from the shop list.

trans-unit.source: Current theme is unavailable. Please check your theme's directory name ("%s") and permissions.
trans-unit.target: Trenutna tema je nedostupna. Provjerite u svom direktoriju s temama naziv ("%s") i dozvole.

trans-unit.source: No items found
trans-unit.target: No items found

trans-unit.source: Duplicate images were found when moving the product images. This is likely caused by unused demonstration images. Please make sure that the folder %folder% only contains demonstration images, and then delete it.
trans-unit.target: Pronađene su duple slike kada ste premještali slike proizvoda. To se često događa s nekorištenim demonstracijskim slikama. Molimo budite sigurni da direktorij %folder% sadrži samo demonstracijske slike, i tada ih obrišite.

trans-unit.source: Incorrect value for the selected JPEG image compression.
trans-unit.target: Incorrect value for the selected JPEG image compression.

trans-unit.source: Incorrect value for the selected PNG image compression.
trans-unit.target: Incorrect value for the selected PNG image compression.

trans-unit.source: Source file does not exist or is empty (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: Izvorna datoteka ne postoji ili je prazna (%filepath%)

trans-unit.source: Failed to resize image file (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: Neuspješna promjena veličine slike (%filepath%)

trans-unit.source: Failed to resize image file to high resolution (%filepath%)
trans-unit.target: Neuspjelo povećanje rezolucije slike (%filepath%)

trans-unit.source: Original image is corrupt (%filename%) for product ID %id% or bad permission on folder.
trans-unit.target: Oprginalna slika je oštećena (%filename%) za ID proizvoda %id% ili loša prava na direktoriju.

trans-unit.source: Original image is missing or empty (%filename%) for product ID %id%
trans-unit.target: Originalna slika je izgubljena ili je prazna (%filename%) za proizvod ID %id%

trans-unit.source: Cannot write images for this type: %1$s. Please check the %2$s folder's writing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Ne mogu se zapisati slike ovog tipa: %1$s. Molimo provjerite %2$s direktorij odobrenja za zapisivanje.

trans-unit.source: Only part of the images have been regenerated. The server timed out before finishing.
trans-unit.target: Only part of the images have been regenerated. The server timed out before finishing.

trans-unit.source: Server timed out. The watermark may not have been applied to all images.
trans-unit.target: Server timed out. The watermark may not have been applied to all images.

trans-unit.source: Cannot write "No picture" image to %s images folder. Please check the folder's writing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Ne može pisati "Bez slike" slike u %s direktorij slika. Molimo provjerite prava pisanja u direktorij.

trans-unit.source: Error: Your server configuration is not compatible with the new image system. No images were moved.
trans-unit.target: Error: Your server configuration is not compatible with the new image system. No images were moved.

trans-unit.source: Not all images have been moved. The server timed out before finishing. Click on "Move images" again to resume the moving process.
trans-unit.target: Not all images have been moved. The server timed out before finishing. Click on "Move images" again to resume the moving process.

trans-unit.source: Error: Some -- or all -- images cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: Error: Some -- or all -- images cannot be moved.

trans-unit.source: After modification, do not forget to regenerate thumbnails
trans-unit.target: After modification, do not forget to regenerate thumbnails

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file is too large.
trans-unit.target: Datoteka za prenos je prevelika.

trans-unit.source: Failed to move uploaded file.
trans-unit.target: Greška u premještaju uplodane datoteke.

trans-unit.source: This theme is not valid for PrestaShop 1.7
trans-unit.target: Ova tema ne vrijedi za PrestaShop 1.7

trans-unit.source: An error occurred. The information "%s" is missing.
trans-unit.target: Dogodila se greška. Informacija "%s" nedostaje.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred. The template "%s" is missing.
trans-unit.target: Dogodila se greške. Šablon "%s" nedostaje.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading the favicon: cannot copy file "%s" to folder "%s".
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while uploading the favicon: cannot copy file "%s" to folder "%s".

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly exported: %path%
trans-unit.target: Vaša tema je pravilno izvezena: %path%

trans-unit.source: The page Category cannot be moved here.
trans-unit.target: Kategorija ne može biti premještena ovdje.

trans-unit.source: Your RTL stylesheets has been generated successfully
trans-unit.target: Vaši RTL stilski listovi uspješno su generirani

trans-unit.source: Your theme has been correctly reset to its default settings. You may want to regenerate your images. See the Improve > Design > Images Settings screen for the 'Regenerate thumbnails' button.
trans-unit.target: Vaša tema je korektno resetovana na početne postavke. Možda će te morati sačekati da se slike regenerišu. Pogledajte Napredak > Design > Postavke slika zaslona za 'Regenerisane sličice' dugme.

trans-unit.source: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.
trans-unit.target: Već postoji tema %theme_name% u vašem direktoriju tema. Uklonite je, ako želite nastaviti.

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete theme. Make sure you have permissions and theme is not used.
trans-unit.target: Brisanje teme nije uspjelo. Provjerite da li imate dopuštenja i tema se ne upotrebljava.

trans-unit.source: Cannot adapt theme to RTL languages.
trans-unit.target: Tema se ne može prilagoditi RTL jezicima.

trans-unit.source: This name already exists.
trans-unit.target: This name already exists.

trans-unit.source: Invalid file format.
trans-unit.target: Neispravan format datoteke.

trans-unit.source: Warning: if no email logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Warning: if no email logo is available, the main logo will be used instead.
